## INTERCEPT\_METHOD\_KEY variable

Metadata key for method-level interceptors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
INTERCEPT_METHOD_KEY: MetadataAccessor<GenericInterceptorOrKey<InvocationContext>[], MethodDecorator>
```
